snippet: Two proposed Mandarin language immersion charter schools that have drawn fierce opposition from school officials and parents failed to win approval from the Education Department.
lead_paragraph: Two proposed Mandarin language immersion charter schools that have drawn fierce opposition from school officials and parents failed to win approval from the Education Department.

headline.main: New Jersey Denies Bids for Two Mandarin Schools
headline.print_headline: Two Mandarin Charter Schools Are Not Approved by New Jersey
headline.seo: Mandarin Language Charter Schools Not Approved by New Jersey
